/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, with cars and motorcycles moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Buildings flank the street on both sides, their facades bathed in sunlight. Trees line the street, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and movement of the city.
